title: The champ that tilts you the most?
body:
Of all the champs which one do you sigh the hardest at when they are picked against you in ranked, that champ that you cant stand to fight even though you're way ahead? Not the most OP champ or even the one you hate the most (although they might all be the same champ in some cases) but just the one you cant stand playing against.

Mine is {{champion:103}} when i see her i just think 'why the fuck did i even wake up this morning...'

replies.body: All of the assassins. I main Fighters, so I can't outplay them. It's simply a case of off-tanks are terrible vs them. And offtank is literally the only way I can play.
fcking yasuo top lane, I play sion a lot and normally beat him but it just tilts me mentally

Fiora. 

While I hate going against Riven and Teemo, they actually have counterplay and you can play safe against them. If you play safe and build resistances early, assuming you didn't die to them, you're safe.

But Fiora? Nooo. Armour does very little, and health does even worse. So for the next 15 minutes you can do nothing but watch the minions whack each other while cowering at the tip of the maximum exp range. 

Fiora is the epitome of anti-fun.
Blitz... He ruins bot lane for any solo queue game when you verse him.
A Yasuo that rushes shiv, rather than phantom dance
zed and yas bust my balls. Oh and tank fizz top.
When there is a Lee and Blitz in the enemy team,  I know they will come invade my jg to screw me over lvl 1. Like go away, let me chill with my gromp pls.

{{champion:157}} 

Mainly only when I play Ahri, which is a lot, seeing as she's my most played champion. Everything about Yasuo irritates me.

I can agree here. With the statement of irritation.. Even though I had a short stint (level 3 Mastery Yasuo) of maining him, I found after awhile he irritated me, even being the one playing him.

Whenever I see a Yasuo with Blood Moon - I can almost always predict the player will be toxic / arrogant.

This tilts me.

From his 1000 dashes in lane, to his obnoxious windwall, to his extremely handy and versatile Q and his FREE shield. Ugh.

Also, whenever you've acquired a Yasuo on your team, he's just super cocky and arrogant the entire game.

As I usually always support/mid (sometimes Top) my tilt is usually {{champion:11}} or {{champion:53}} .

As most people that play these two tend to brag about their awesomeness - when we all know, they are low risk; high reward champions that have a very low skill cap.
As a top lane main its gotta be {{champion:17}}
Ahri is the midlane Blitz. You can dodge all her charms, but the moment one hits you, you're dead.

you need to have a chessmaster-like mind to vs ahri. think and plan ahead on what is gonna happen if you engage
for me, its better to engage her first than waiting for her to make mistakes while being poked at
